text: (visvasavantayini! obagen) kavurun (saturan visin) vedana karanu læba, pasuva allah venuven (tamange rata-gama athæra dama) pitatva giyoda, ovunta niyata vasayenma api melovadida, honda vasasthanayanma laba dennemu. paralova phalavipaka nam, (mitat vada) itamat visalaya. (meya) ovun dæna gata yutu noveda
